name: Planet: Terror
description:
The brave Nova Hunter is on a mission: Stop the Doom Clock.

The Doom Clock is slowly getting more dangerous and is going to explode when the timer hits zero. It is guarded by 3 giant robots that will have to get killed in order to complete your mission. With many weapons in different levels, you can go on your way to destroy all robots and save the world.

You can choose between 3 different difficulties, easy normal and hard

Our Submission to the Ramadan Development Nights Game Jam. Made by AfterFlash, Mariem and me (IchBinLeon)

Credits (can also be found in the game's main menu):

Tileset by @livingtheindie on itch.io

Ground texture from en.depositphotos.com

Desert Rock by @imonk on itch.io
